scan_metadata.description: opensearch - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if access control is enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if access control is enabled for domains

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if audit logging is enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if audit logging is enabled for domains

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if CloudWatch logging is enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if CloudWatch logging is enabled for domains

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if encryption at rest is enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if encryption at rest is enabled for domains

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check fault tolerance of data nodes
check_functions.description: Verifies fault tolerance for data nodes

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check fault tolerance of master nodes
check_functions.description: Verifies fault tolerance for master nodes

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if HTTPS is enforced
check_functions.description: Checks if HTTPS communications are enforced

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check if internal user database is enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if internal user database is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check node-to-node encryption
check_functions.description: Checks if node-to-node encryption is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check public accessibility
check_functions.description: Ensures domains are not publicly accessible

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check software version updates
check_functions.description: Checks if domains are updated to latest software version

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check Cognito authentication for Kibana
check_functions.description: Checks if Cognito authentication is used for Kibana
